question: 2-Methyl propane can be prepared by Wurtz reaction. The haloalkanes taken along with metallic sodium and dry ether are: [cite: 207-208]
explanation: Wurtz reaction couples two alkyl groups. To get 2-methylpropane (Isobutane), one needs an isopropyl group and a methyl group. Thus, chloromethane and 2-chloropropane are required. [cite: 209, 210]
